item.description:
Comedy Night Competitions at Gas Lamp Grille
Thursday July 29, 2010
8:00 PM

The fee has been $5.00pp. I was told I can call for a discount if we get a group together.

This week is an event with professional, amateur, and novice comedians....

Gas Lamp Grille has been having comedy nights random Thursday nights once a month.
This week they say they will start at 9PM prompt - upstairs.
Suggestion is we get there by 8PM. We can celebrate with Drinks, Apps or Dinner - the food is great..

The last comedians I previewed were funny, it was a great time - some were comedians that have been at The Comedy Connection in East Providence.

Hope to see you there : ).

Please keep your RSVP accurate so that I can schedule seating for our group appropriately.
item.how_to_find_us: Great Turnout..Looking forward to having a fun night. Meet downstairs at 8PM reservations under Lonnie. txt or call if needed 829-8516.
item.name: Comedy Night Fun with Drinks and/or Food at Gas Lamp Grille
